statements: SELECT researcher_id, experiment_id, experiment_date, experiment_location, water_usage, results FROM ConservationResearchData;
SELECT * FROM ConservationResearchData;
SELECT experiment_date, experiment_location, results FROM ConservationResearchData;
SELECT researcher_id, experiment_location, water_usage FROM ConservationResearchData;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date, water_usage FROM ConservationResearchData;
SELECT * FROM ConservationResearchData WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT researcher_id, experiment_id, experiment_location FROM ConservationResearchData WHERE water_usage < 50 ORDER BY researcher_id ASC
SELECT MAX(water_usage) AS max_water_usage, MIN(water_usage) AS min_water_usage FROM ConservationResearchData
SELECT * FROM ConservationResearchData WHERE experiment_location LIKE 'Forest%'
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage, COUNT(*) AS total_experiments FROM ConservationResearchData
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT name, organization FROM Researchers;
SELECT field_of_study, name FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM Experiments;
SELECT experiment_date, result FROM Experiments;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE field_of_study='Physics' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT researcher_id, name, organization FROM Researchers WHERE organization='ABC University'
SELECT * FROM Experiments WHERE result='Positive' AND experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY experiment_date ASC
SELECT Researchers.name, Experiments.methodology FROM Researchers INNER JOIN Experiments ON Researchers.researcher_id = Experiments.researcher_id WHERE Researchers.name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT DISTINCT organization FROM Researchers
SELECT * FROM Researcher;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Researcher ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT institution, full_name FROM Researcher WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT observation_id, observation_date, observation_result FROM Observation ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, full_name, email, institution FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Researcher WHERE institution = 'University A';
SELECT observation_date, observation_result FROM Observation ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, institution FROM Researcher WHERE institution = 'Company X' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT researcher_id, full_name, email, institution FROM Researcher WHERE email NOT LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date, location FROM Experiment WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT location, observations FROM field_studies WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT method, result FROM data_analysis WHERE experiment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT study_id, location FROM field_studies WHERE study_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT result FROM experiments;
SELECT researchers.name, experiments.result FROM researchers JOIN experiments ON researchers.researcher_id = experiments.researcher_id ORDER BY name ASC, result DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT experiment_title, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT study_location, study_date, study_results FROM field_studies WHERE study_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM conservation_methods WHERE method_id > 3;
SELECT researcher_name, study_location FROM researchers JOIN field_studies ON researchers.researcher_id = field_studies.researcher_id;
SELECT data_date, data_entry FROM research_data WHERE researcher_id = 4 AND data_date >= '2022-01-01';
